column5: Hi all,  Had planned to go for a long day fising at Burr Lake with some buddies. As things turned out my buddy had a medical emergency in the family and could not come.   I ended up going and got into a ton of perch but had to wait til the last bite of the day for a walleye. Was nice that the perch were being aggressiv today....made for a lot of running between my two lines, keeping me occupied as i waited for the walleye to show up. I was going to move but never did as time was limited.   Anyway, got a couple of nice fillets of walleye in the end, wasn't cold, and was kept busy. (i would have kept some perch as they were big enough, but i was noticing a lot of worms in the flesh around the gills and mouth.   All fish in 17 - 19 FOW on jig and plain hook with split shot sinker.     TONS OF THESE GUYS         ONLY WALLEYE FOR TODAY  <embed width="448" height="361" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" wmode="transparent" src="http://i263.photobucket.com/player.swf?file=http://vid263.photobucket.com/albums/ii158/vishuscirquel/MVI_2540.flv">     Best wishes for the new year to you all.

Great report, pic and video Simon  It sure fun catching perch when they are active on a jig     Keeps you busy like you said  Good on you for sticking it out and sweet reward catching that very nice walter Best wishes to you to Keep those reports coming and thanks for sharing Jacques
Nice to see you got out Simon. And a nice bonus walleye at the end too! Thanks for sharing and I hope your Bud's medical emergency turned out ok.
Thanks for the report. It's a crazy kind of fun running between holes when the perch are on.
Nice update Simon, chasing perch beats sitting inside all day.

Nice day on the ice simon !!!!   well done,at least you have great conditions up there,its been just pouring rain down here !!!...glad you got a nice eye for a meal !!!cheers   happy new year to you as well...
that was a nice chunky walleye!  cheers!
Perch Frenzy you say............  Yeah same hear simon ,, seems to be the pattern this year , 20 perch to every pike .As far as walleye,, none yet     Better luck in the new year
